ygData.subject: Re: What class does GZ play?
ygData.msgSnippet: That was my observation, too, Sylly.  Disenchanting Melody removes DOTs (but only DOTs) (and it does so on the first pulse or not at all).  Of course, when I
ygData.messageBody:
That was my observation, too, Sylly. Disenchanting Melody removes DOTs (but only
DOTs) (and it does so on the first pulse or not at all). Of course, when I
mentioned this here, I did not get a lot of positive feedback. ;) Assuming
that it's working, though, it's still a crummy song. I can think of few places
where it would rank among my top eight (although it might have been useful in
Befallen). Maybe it only works on Innoruuk. hehe

Kenross Cantoforjado, level 30 (still), Innoruuk


James Schuldes wrote:
>
> From: James Schuldes <jgs@...>
>
> Why do you think it's broken? I used it just the other day to remove DoT's.
> It removes some things but not all things. I had to equip a string intru and
> designate a target to play it on. But he told me his DoT dropped right as I
> played the song.
>
> Sylly.
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Reece, Tom - 25IDL G4
>
> I hope when [GZ] reaches 22d level he will also realize that Disenchanting
> Melody is broken.
>
>
